Topic.Title: Is there a way to make notes or bookmarks?

Posts.EditableText:
is there a way you can make a note (like in python when you type a # ex, #this is a note)
or bookmark
Posts.HTML:
is there a way you can make a note (like in python when you type a # ex, #this is a note)
or bookmark

Posts.EditableText:
In a javascript section you can have javascript comments.
```
    // Comment!
```
In the text part of a section, you can include any HTML, which includes `<!-- HTML comments -->`
Posts.HTML:
In a javascript section you can have javascript comments.

    // Comment!

In the text part of a section, you can include any HTML, which includes <!-- HTML comments -->
